Interface ec.meta.WeakCell

public interface interface WeakCell
extends Tether
A WeakCell is a Tether that specifically points weakly at another object for the purposes of EGC. One may ask for the target directly, hence making it a strong reference, or one may merely use the Tether methods without strengthening the reference, as it were.

getTarget()
Get the target of this WeakCell.
setTarget(Object)
Change the target of this WeakCell.

getTarget 
 public abstract Object getTarget()
Get the target of this WeakCell.

Returns:
nullOk; the current target of the WeakCell, or null if there is none
setTarget 
 public abstract void setTarget(Object theTarget)
Change the target of this WeakCell.

Parameters:
nullOk; - theTarget the new target for the WeakCell
